plugins.name: Design-to-JSON
plugins.description:
Design to JSON: A Developer's Bridge


Supercharge your design-to-development workflow with Design to JSON. This plugin inspects your selected Figma layers and recursively exports the entire hierarchy into a clean, structured, and developer-friendly JSON format. Stop manually transcribing design specs and start automating your UI development.


Who Is It For?

This plugin is built primarily for Frontend Developers and UI Engineers who need to translate Figma designs into pixel-perfect code. It's also a powerful tool for Design System Maintainers and anyone looking to automate asset extraction or design analysis.


Key Features:

•Recursive Tree Traversal: It doesn't just scan the top layer. The plugin dives deep into all nested frames, groups, and components to give you a complete hierarchical view.

•Absolute Coordinates for Layout: Outputs the global coordinates and dimensions (absoluteRenderBounds) for every element, which is exactly what you need for CSS positioning, eliminating guesswork with relative positions.

•Comprehensive Property Extraction: Captures a wide range of properties crucial for development:

oGeometry: Position, size, rotation.

oStyling: Fills, strokes, and effects with RGBA color values (0-255).

oTypography: Font family, style, size, line height, letter spacing, and alignment.

oAuto Layout: Direction, padding, and item spacing.

oComponent Info: Details about instances and their main components.

•Simple & Clean UI: A straightforward interface to generate and copy the JSON with a single click.


How to Use:

1.Select one or more elements on your Figma canvas.

2.Run the "Design to JSON" plugin.

3.Click the "Generate JSON" button.

4.The JSON output will appear in the text area.

5.Click "Copy to Clipboard" to grab the data and use it in your code.


Best Practices for Your Design File:

To get the most accurate and useful JSON, it's recommended to follow these design practices:

•Name Your Layers: Use descriptive layer names (e.g., "SubmitButton" instead of "Rectangle 128"). These names appear directly in the JSON, making it much more readable.

•Embrace Auto Layout: The plugin is built to understand Auto Layout. Using it for components, buttons, and layouts will provide rich data (padding, spacing, direction) that is directly translatable to Flexbox or similar CSS models.

•Use Components: Structuring your design with components helps maintain a clean hierarchy, which will be reflected in the JSON output. The plugin captures instance information.

•Avoid Unnecessary Grouping: Whenever possible, use Frames with Auto Layout instead of nested groups (Group > Group > Element). This results in a cleaner and more semantic JSON structure.


Limitations & Caveats:

•Mixed Styles in Text: While the plugin recursively finds the properties of individual elements, if a single text node contains multiple styles (e.g., different fonts or colors applied to different words), the Figma API provides summary data. The plugin will note this but cannot separate the mixed styles within that single element.

•Complex Vector Data: This plugin focuses on properties relevant for UI layout and styling. It does not export the raw path data (<path d="...">) of complex vector networks or boolean operations.

•API Boundaries: The plugin can only extract data that is exposed by the official Figma Plugin API.


Support the Developer

This plugin is developed and maintained with love. If you find it useful and it saves you time, you can say thanks by supporting its future development. Every bit of support is hugely appreciated!

plugins.name: Real Data Filler
plugins.description:
Real Data Filler is a quick and smart plugin that populates your Figma text layers with realistic placeholder data — perfect for mockups, UI design, and prototypes.


Choose from a clean, tabbed interface with options like:


Names (full names, first/last)


Emails (realistic domains)


Cities (worldwide)


Phone Numbers


Custom Lists (coming soon)


Each selected text node gets a random data value of the type you select.


Use this to:


Populate wireframes with real-seeming names and emails


Fill mobile/table UI designs with user data


Quickly visualize form states and list views

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: DeepL Translator
plugins.description:
DeepL Translator


A Figma plugin that quickly translates text within frames using the DeepL API.

The acceleration feature enables faster translations and cost savings.


Features


  1. 🚀 Fast Translation: Re-use past translation history for fast fast translation
  2. 💰️ Cost Saving: Save API Usage by Re-use past translation history
  3. 🌐 Multi-language Support: Supports 29 languages
  4. 📚 Glossary Support: Use DeepL glossaries for consistent translations
  5. 🌍 Auto Detection: Automatic source language detection
  6. 📝 Non-destructive: Creates new frames for translations while preserving originals
  7. 🎯 Simple Operation: Just select languages and click translate


How to Use


  1. Get a DeepL API key (see below)
  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key


1. Sign up for a DeepL account at DeepL Pro

  1. Free plan available (500,000 characters/month)
  2. Pro plan available for more usage

2. Get your API key:

  1. Log in to your DeepL account
  2. Go to "Account" → "API keys"
  3. Copy your API key

3. Enter your API key in the plugin settings


Supported Languages


See the complete list of supported languages for details.


Major languages include:


  1. English (EN)
  2. Chinese (ZH)
  3. Korean (KO)
  4. German (DE)
  5. French (FR)
  6. Spanish (ES)
  7. Italian (IT)
  8. Dutch (NL)
  9. Japanese (JA)
  10. Portuguese (PT)
  11. Russian (RU)


And 18 more languages


Notes


  1. DeepL API key required (available with free plan)
  2. Free plan includes 500,000 characters per month
  3. Source language must be specified when using glossaries
  4. API keys are securely encrypted and stored


Support & Feedback


We welcome your feedback! Please contact to developer through:


- Contact Form for:

  1. Questions & Inquiries
  2. Feature Requests
  3. Bug Reports
  4. General Feedback


Privacy

  1. DeepL API keys are securely encrypted
  2. Translation data is processed on DeepL servers and not stored
plugins.tagline: Translate texts in Figma by DeepL

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer—in one click.


🚀 Key Features

  1. Alpha-Safe Mapping: Automatically preserves transparency values (alpha channel)
  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


🔧 Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders

Get lifetime access for a one-time fee of $10. No subscription. Free updates forever.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks

135581.name: Token Architect
135581.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

- Added generate tokens functionality
- Added generate brand colour shades functionality
- Fixed bugs 
- Refined token output

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: Bulk Renamer
plugins.description:
Bulk Renamer 2.0


A powerful, user-friendly tool for renaming multiple frames or components in one go.


Bulk Renamer 2.0 lets you paste a list of names (typed manually, copied from Excel, or generated elsewhere) and instantly apply them to your selected frames — in the exact order and direction you choose.


⸻


✨ Features:

•Rename frames by typing or pasting names

•Smart support for Excel/Sheets cell pastes

•Auto-adds commas only when you press Enter

•Supports left-to-right or top-to-bottom frame direction

•Real-time validation for name count vs frame selection

•Clean, dark-themed UI with live feedback


⸻


🪄 How to use:

1.Select your frames/components in Figma

2.Choose your naming direction

3.Paste or type names (one per line)

4.Click Apply to rename all selected items
plugins.tagline: Rename multiple frames all at once.

plugins.name: ColourSwatch
plugins.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.
plugins.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.description:
Renamer — Smarter Layer Naming


A Figma plugin that keeps your layers organized by automatically generating clear, descriptive names based on their properties. Perfect for maintaining a consistent and readable file structure in complex designs.


Just select your layers and run the plugin — names will be updated instantly based on your settings.


Layer properties included:

  1. Dimensions (width × height)
  2. Fill color (HEX code)
  3. Opacity values
  4. Effects (shadows, blurs)
  5. Constraints
  6. Corner radius
  7. Stroke details
  8. Auto Layout settings

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer with 5+ years of experience in web and mobile UI. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

plugins.name: Interflow Connect
plugins.description:
Transform your design-to-management workflow with Interflow Connect, the Figma plugin that brings your UI flows directly into the Interflow. Designed for product teams and designers who demand efficiency, Interflow Connect eliminates the tedious process of manual uploads, allowing you to focus on what truly matters—creating exceptional user interfaces.


Streamlined Workflow, Unmatched Efficiency


With Interflow Connect, transferring your designs from Figma to Interflow is as simple as a few clicks. Select your desired frames within Figma, assign or create the appropriate flow and section names, and upload your screens directly to the Interflow without ever leaving your design environment. This seamless integration ensures your UI flows are always up-to-date and easily accessible for audits and reviews, making collaboration across teams more efficient than ever.


Secure, Direct Integration


Security and simplicity are at the heart of Interflow Connect. By inputting and authenticating your personal API key—generated from your Interflow settings—the plugin securely identifies your account, organization, and product. This robust authentication process guarantees that your design data is transmitted safely and accurately, offering a streamlined connection between your creative process in Figma and your product management workflow in Interflow.


Empower Your Product Design and Management


Interflow Connect is more than just a plugin—it’s the bridge between your design interface and your management platform. Whether you’re refining your product’s UI, conducting detailed audits, or ensuring that every screen aligns with your design strategy, this plugin is engineered to supercharge your workflow. Enjoy a smoother onboarding process, reduce manual errors, and keep your design projects perfectly synchronized with your product roadmap.


Experience a new level of productivity and collaboration by integrating your design and management tools. With Interflow Connect, you’re not just uploading screens—you’re empowering your team to build better products, faster.
plugins.tagline: The bridge between your interfaces in figma and your interflow.

plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles
